metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43281 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Double Free vulnerability in Nothings Stb Image.h v.2.28 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via a crafted file to the stbi_load_gif_main function.

criterions.comment: arm-compute-library package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
armnn package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
